attributes.action: remove the pointless speed humps on small residential streets in nottingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the amount of speed humps in nottingham is stupid i agree with them on main roads but on a street with less than twenty houses is pointless people who stop to go over them drive slow anyway and the people who drive fast continue to drive fast and the joyriders enjoy them all they do is reck decent peoples car and make the area less disirable to live in

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Nohumps/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
